mapper.select: select count() as active_cnt from haylou_datawares.dwd_app_bind_device_dt_dfs a where a.bind_status = 1

select a.device_type,round(a.active_cnt*1.0/tot_active_cnt,2) as ratio from ( select device_type, count() as active_cnt from haylou_datawares.dwd_app_bind_device_dt_dfs a where a.bind_status = 1 group by device_type ) a,( select count() as tot_active_cnt from haylou_datawares.dwd_app_bind_device_dt_dfs a where a.bind_status = 1 ) b

select count() as act_cnt from haylou_datawares.dwd_app_bind_device_dt_dfs a where a.bind_status = 1 and a.pdate >= toString(toYYYYMMDD(toStartOfMonth(addMonths(now(),-1)))) and a.pdate < toString(toYYYYMMDD(toStartOfMonth(now()))) ;

select c.device_type, case when c.fd_age=1 then '17岁以下' when c.fd_age=2 then '18-24' when c.fd_age=3 then '25-30' when c.fd_age=4 then '31-35' when c.fd_age=5 then '36-40' when c.fd_age=6 then '41以上' end as fd_age_desc, c.bind_cnt*1.0/b.tot_bind_cnt as bind_ratio from ( select device_type,fd_age,count() as bind_cnt from ( select device_type, case when age <= 17 then 1 when age >= 18 and age <= 24 then 2 when age >= 25 and age <= 30 then 3 when age >= 31 and age <= 35 then 4 when age >= 36 and age <= 40 then 5 else 6 end as fd_age from haylou_datawares.dwd_app_bind_device_dt_dfs where bind_status in (1, 3) ) a group by device_type,fd_age ) c , ( select count() as tot_bind_cnt from haylou_datawares.dwd_app_bind_device_dt_dfs where bind_status in (1, 3) ) b order by fd_age_desc asc
select count() as tot_bind_cnt from haylou_datawares.dwd_app_bind_device_dt_dfs where bind_status in (1, 3)
